title: 2024 Gift Guide For Her!
description: My 2024 women’s gift guide is here! All my favorite things in one place that I love so much. This gift guide is filled with TONS of my favorite things. The bags, shoes, pajamas and year-after-year items I use. You’ve seen and heard of a lot of them throughout 2024 as I’ve shared them in […] The post 2024 Gift Guide For Her! appeared first on How Sweet Eats.
author: Jessica
excerpt: My 2024 women’s gift guide is here! All my favorite things in one place that I love so much.
text: My 2024 women’s gift guide is here! All my favorite things in one place that I love so much. This gift guide is filled with TONS of my favorite things. The bags, shoes, pajamas and year-after-year items I use. You’ve seen and heard of a lot of them throughout 2024 as I’ve shared them in my favorites, but these are the best of the best of what I am loving! I’ve also included a few splurge items that I personally own and love and find to be worth it! Of course these gifts can be for anyone! These are my personal picks out of everything I have loved over the years. 2024 GIFT GUIDE FOR HER Lola blankets. This is my #1 gift this year. I’ve already bought six this year for gifts! It is the softest warmest faux fur blanket I’ve found. It’s not heavy (in a good way) and it’s almost stretchy. I LOVE IT. A caveat: never pay full price, there is always a discount code! I recently used cozy50 to get 50% off. It’s not my code, but just one I found! 2025 Calendar. I use this desk calendar every year. It’s my favorite one.  Le Pliage cosmetics case. Another huge winner for me when it comes to gifts. This can be a little catch all pouch kept in your purse but it’s also easy to grab and go when running errands. I’ve also seen people transform them into crossbody bags too.  Book Lover’s advent calendar. Eeeeep! I just ordered this as a gift… for me.  Lululemon Align Pants. You cannot go wrong with these. They have been uniform for years. Nothing compares. Mildliner Markers. These are my favorite to use in my planner. Hotel Lobby votive candle set. Some of my favorite candles – the scents are so elevated, warming and unisex. Excellent gift for a home decor lover.  Think Rolyn little runway sling. This is my favorite sling bag. I have multiple colors. It can fit a pack of wipes and a standard sized bottle of water. It’s awesome.  Monogrammed Journal. Cutest for the pen and paper lover! Apple watch band. I love my apple watch but hate the band options. This one is so good. Primrose vanity mirror. Another fave from last year. A mini version of the viral mirror.  Insulated lunch bag. Perfect for work lunches or traveling snacks.  Cherry drop earrings. Loving these. They are SO cute.  Silk Pillowcase. This is something I use every single day. I think it’s a great gift! I even travel with mine if I go somewhere. Healthy hair brush. This for a scalp massage is incredible. Laptop Lap Desk. My parents got me this last a few years ago and I LOVE IT. Hot and Cold foam froth maker. Makes cold foam! Sign me up! Eberjey slouchy pajamas. This is my favorite lounge set that doesn’t 100% look like pajamas. The red is my fave.  Moonlit Pajamas. This is something else I share every single year. BEST PAJAMAS EVER! So stretchy and soft and comfortable. I live in these. I love every version: the nightgowns, the button down PJs, the v-neck top ones. Ugg Mini Boot. I will always profess my love for Uggs despite how ugly they can look. They are SO good for cold weather here. I get a new black pair every few years after I wear the heck out of mine. I got the black short ones last year and love them. Vibrant color scarf. Always love a good anthro scarf.  MZ Wallace sequin micro hobo bag. I saw this and just about died. The sapphire color is unreal! MZ Wallace bags are such excellent quality. I need this.  Hoka Bondi 8 running shoe. No brainer – the best running, walking, living shoe ever.  Stripe cashmere sweater. Looks so much more high end than it is!  Nike Phoenix Fleece hoodie. Current favorite sweatshirt. It’s so cozy. Simple Modern 40oz tumbler. I have loved the Stanely tumbler for years, but this one has won out. It’s almost leak proof, so much sleeker, lighter and more economical. I adore it. Fluffy Hotel Robe. If you prefer a fluffy hotel-like robe, I’m in love with this one. The tie dye on the edges is so cute without being obnoxious too. The kids have matching ones! Tory Burch card case. I’ve used one for years. Best quality ever.  Le Specs Air Heart Sunglasses. My go-to sunglasses for over five years. Adore them. Small puffy heart earrings. I love these so much. They are a bit of a splurge but a nice way to get a timeless piece on that is on trend right now.  Puffy heart locket. And I locket!! I have one with the kids in it. I love it.  Handpainted taper candles. Most beautiful candles. Pair with candles to gift!  Luster glass butter dish. I want this for my own kitchen.  1000 Record Covers book. Coffee table books make such a great gift. This one is fab!  Monogrammed playing cards. Got two of these for gifts this year. How fun.  Oversized cashmere wrap. This j crew wrap has been around for years and I’ve gifted it many times. It’s excellent. There is always a sale on these too, so don’t pay full price.  Mini hair clip set. Can’t live without them! I also lose them often… so would love to be gifted more.  Velvet jewelry box. Adore this for travel.  Candy cane checkers set. Super fun. This would also be a gorgeous decor piece.  Flume electric lighter. SO chic and necessary.  Chunky knit bow beanie. I love a fun beanie for cold weather.  Bubble monogram earrings. Cutest initial bubble earrings!  Condiment set with spoons. This is stunning. I added it to my own list.  Wood serving bowl. Another beautiful kitchen piece too. Great for someone who doesn’t cook too – can just use it for salads!  Veronica Beard valentina sneaker. These are a higher end item, but when I say I love them… oh my gosh. I’ve had a pair for 2 years, I still wear them constantly and they are in great condition. They are slip on with a slight platform. Adore them!  New Balance 327 sneakers. I also still love these sneakers. The shape is just so good and they are flattering on the food! Watercolor workbook.  Faux fur bow slippers. Slippers are often the perfect gift!  Olukai slide slippers. These are my favorite “working” slippers that I wear around the house. They have SO much support.  Ugg disquette slipper. And my favorite wear out of the house slippers. Beaded city pouch.  Hulken bag. I use this almost every week. I’ve gifted many of them. They are wonderful for toting groceries, travel, moving, etc. Even just organizing the house or cleaning up! Higher Dose sauna blanket. We both use my higher dose sauna and pemf mat weekly. I could not live without them. This is a wellness investment that has totally changed the game for us.  Crystal pave hoop earrings. Prettiest pave hoops!  Varley Vine pullover. This is a classic that looks good with sweats or jeans. I’ve had a few for years and they get constant wear.  Sam Edelman Tote. This is giving goyard vibes and I am here for it – I don’t think I could ever pay $ for a goyard tote. I love how these look almost the same without being too copycat-ish. Beis carry on suitcase. We now have two and I just ordered a third for our family. Very happy with the quality of these – and we have Tumi suitcases! It’s nice that these ones don’t break the bank like those do. Canon Mini Photo Printer. Not only do I love this, the kids love it! I print out lots of pictures from my phone, which print on a sticker. You can add the pics to your planner, calendar, cards, etc. I stick pictures of Jordan in the kids’ backpack! Scout Tote Bag. Everyone, seriously everyone, needs a scout bag. They fold flat and take up no space. They have a zipper and hold SO much. You can transport anything in them. They are waterproof! Absolutely perfect. I love these for teacher gifts with a gift card.
html:
My 2024 women’s gift guide is here! All my favorite things in one place that I love so much.

This gift guide is filled with TONS of my favorite things. The bags, shoes, pajamas and year-after-year items I use. You’ve seen and heard of a lot of them throughout 2024 as I’ve shared them in my favorites, but these are the best of the best of what I am loving! I’ve also included a few splurge items that I personally own and love and find to be worth it!

Of course these gifts can be for anyone! These are my personal picks out of everything I have loved over the years.

2024 GIFT GUIDE FOR HER

Lola blankets. This is my #1 gift this year. I’ve already bought six this year for gifts! It is the softest warmest faux fur blanket I’ve found. It’s not heavy (in a good way) and it’s almost stretchy. I LOVE IT. A caveat: never pay full price, there is always a discount code! I recently used cozy50 to get 50% off. It’s not my code, but just one I found!

2025 Calendar. I use this desk calendar every year. It’s my favorite one. 

Le Pliage cosmetics case. Another huge winner for me when it comes to gifts. This can be a little catch all pouch kept in your purse but it’s also easy to grab and go when running errands. I’ve also seen people transform them into crossbody bags too. 

Book Lover’s advent calendar. Eeeeep! I just ordered this as a gift… for me. 

Lululemon Align Pants. You cannot go wrong with these. They have been uniform for years. Nothing compares.

Mildliner Markers. These are my favorite to use in my planner.

Hotel Lobby votive candle set. Some of my favorite candles – the scents are so elevated, warming and unisex. Excellent gift for a home decor lover. 

Think Rolyn little runway sling. This is my favorite sling bag. I have multiple colors. It can fit a pack of wipes and a standard sized bottle of water. It’s awesome. 

Monogrammed Journal. Cutest for the pen and paper lover!

Apple watch band. I love my apple watch but hate the band options. This one is so good.

Primrose vanity mirror. Another fave from last year. A mini version of the viral mirror. 

Insulated lunch bag. Perfect for work lunches or traveling snacks. 

Cherry drop earrings. Loving these. They are SO cute. 

Silk Pillowcase. This is something I use every single day. I think it’s a great gift! I even travel with mine if I go somewhere.

Healthy hair brush. This for a scalp massage is incredible.

Laptop Lap Desk. My parents got me this last a few years ago and I LOVE IT.

Hot and Cold foam froth maker. Makes cold foam! Sign me up!

Eberjey slouchy pajamas. This is my favorite lounge set that doesn’t 100% look like pajamas. The red is my fave. 

Moonlit Pajamas. This is something else I share every single year. BEST PAJAMAS EVER! So stretchy and soft and comfortable. I live in these. I love every version: the nightgowns, the button down PJs, the v-neck top ones.

Ugg Mini Boot. I will always profess my love for Uggs despite how ugly they can look. They are SO good for cold weather here. I get a new black pair every few years after I wear the heck out of mine. I got the black short ones last year and love them.

Vibrant color scarf. Always love a good anthro scarf. 

MZ Wallace sequin micro hobo bag. I saw this and just about died. The sapphire color is unreal! MZ Wallace bags are such excellent quality. I need this. 

Hoka Bondi 8 running shoe. No brainer – the best running, walking, living shoe ever. 

Stripe cashmere sweater. Looks so much more high end than it is! 

Nike Phoenix Fleece hoodie. Current favorite sweatshirt. It’s so cozy.

Simple Modern 40oz tumbler. I have loved the Stanely tumbler for years, but this one has won out. It’s almost leak proof, so much sleeker, lighter and more economical. I adore it.

Fluffy Hotel Robe. If you prefer a fluffy hotel-like robe, I’m in love with this one. The tie dye on the edges is so cute without being obnoxious too. The kids have matching ones!

Tory Burch card case. I’ve used one for years. Best quality ever. 

Le Specs Air Heart Sunglasses. My go-to sunglasses for over five years. Adore them.

Small puffy heart earrings. I love these so much. They are a bit of a splurge but a nice way to get a timeless piece on that is on trend right now. 

Puffy heart locket. And I locket!! I have one with the kids in it. I love it. 

Handpainted taper candles. Most beautiful candles. Pair with candles to gift! 

Luster glass butter dish. I want this for my own kitchen. 

1000 Record Covers book. Coffee table books make such a great gift. This one is fab! 

Monogrammed playing cards. Got two of these for gifts this year. How fun. 

Oversized cashmere wrap. This j crew wrap has been around for years and I’ve gifted it many times. It’s excellent. There is always a sale on these too, so don’t pay full price. 

Mini hair clip set. Can’t live without them! I also lose them often… so would love to be gifted more. 

Velvet jewelry box. Adore this for travel. 

Candy cane checkers set. Super fun. This would also be a gorgeous decor piece. 

Flume electric lighter. SO chic and necessary. 

Chunky knit bow beanie. I love a fun beanie for cold weather. 

Bubble monogram earrings. Cutest initial bubble earrings! 

Condiment set with spoons. This is stunning. I added it to my own list. 

Wood serving bowl. Another beautiful kitchen piece too. Great for someone who doesn’t cook too – can just use it for salads! 

Veronica Beard valentina sneaker. These are a higher end item, but when I say I love them… oh my gosh. I’ve had a pair for 2 years, I still wear them constantly and they are in great condition. They are slip on with a slight platform. Adore them! 

New Balance 327 sneakers. I also still love these sneakers. The shape is just so good and they are flattering on the food!

Watercolor workbook. 

Faux fur bow slippers. Slippers are often the perfect gift! 

Olukai slide slippers. These are my favorite “working” slippers that I wear around the house. They have SO much support. 

Ugg disquette slipper. And my favorite wear out of the house slippers.

Beaded city pouch. 

Hulken bag. I use this almost every week. I’ve gifted many of them. They are wonderful for toting groceries, travel, moving, etc. Even just organizing the house or cleaning up!

Higher Dose sauna blanket. We both use my higher dose sauna and pemf mat weekly. I could not live without them. This is a wellness investment that has totally changed the game for us. 

Crystal pave hoop earrings. Prettiest pave hoops! 

Varley Vine pullover. This is a classic that looks good with sweats or jeans. I’ve had a few for years and they get constant wear. 

Sam Edelman Tote. This is giving goyard vibes and I am here for it – I don’t think I could ever pay $ for a goyard tote. I love how these look almost the same without being too copycat-ish.

Beis carry on suitcase. We now have two and I just ordered a third for our family. Very happy with the quality of these – and we have Tumi suitcases! It’s nice that these ones don’t break the bank like those do.

Canon Mini Photo Printer. Not only do I love this, the kids love it! I print out lots of pictures from my phone, which print on a sticker. You can add the pics to your planner, calendar, cards, etc. I stick pictures of Jordan in the kids’ backpack!

Scout Tote Bag. Everyone, seriously everyone, needs a scout bag. They fold flat and take up no space. They have a zipper and hold SO much. You can transport anything in them. They are waterproof! Absolutely perfect. I love these for teacher gifts with a gift card.
